metadata.title: token forgery with new claims (important)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in python-jwt, where it was subject to Authentication Bypass vulnerability by spoofing, resulting in identity spoofing, session hijacking, or authentication bypass. This flaw allows an attacker who obtains a JWT to arbitrarily forge its contents without knowing the secret key. Depending on the application, the attacker can spoof other users' identities, hijack their sessions, or bypass authentication.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
python-jwt is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
